title: UPDATE 2-Nelson Peltz's Trian Fund takes $2.5 billion stake in GE

Published By: Reuters - Company News - Today 
Oct 5 (Reuters) - Nelson Peltz's Trian Fund Management said it has bought $2.5 billion in General Electric shares since May, making it one o...
